snippet: Daniel Chong, a University of California student, was swept up in a Drug Enforcement Administration raid and placed in a holding cell, where he said he was forgotten for four days, without food or water.
abstract: Drug Enforcement Agency is conducting an internal investigation concerning the case of Daniel Chong, University of California student who was placed in a holding cell and forgotten for four days without food or water, following a raid by the agency.
lead_paragraph: Daniel Chong, a University of California student, was swept up in a Drug Enforcement Administration raid and placed in a holding cell, where he said he was forgotten for four days, without food or water.

headline.seo: California Man Left for Days in Holding Cell
headline.main: California Man’s ‘Drug Holiday’ Becomes Four-Day Nightmare in Holding Cell
headline.print_headline: California Man’s ‘Drug Holiday’ Becomes Four-Day Nightmare in Holding Cell
